start:
👋 Hello!
Send me an Instagram username and I'll gladly fetch its public info for you 😊
help:
👋 Hi!
Just send an Instagram username without the @ and I'll show you its public info 😄
Use the button below to switch languages anytime.
about: ℹ️ I'm a friendly bot powered by Instaloader, here to politely share public Instagram data 🤖
error_private: ⚠️ Sorry, this profile is private and I can't display its info. If you follow the account, try again later or send another username.
error_not_found: ⚠️ That user couldn't be found. Please check the spelling and try again.
error_connection: ⚠️ Something went wrong while connecting to Instagram. Please check your connection and try again shortly.
error_429: ⚠️ Too many requests! Please wait a few minutes and try again.
error_500: ⚠️ Instagram's servers are currently having issues. Please try again later.
error_data: ⚠️ Instagram changed its data structure and I can't show the info right now. Please try again later.
